title: Ultrasonic Cleaner Stains
message:
Wondering if anyone has seen anything like this before.  I keep seeing stains on my boards after running them through my ultrasonic cleaner and letting them dry - looks like this: [url]http://imgur.com/kPMe9Tg[/url].

I use a CP500HT with Branson EC per Louis' recommendations.  Is this a matter of not using enough Isopropyl to clean it off after the ultrasonic bath?  Or perhaps not letting it dry correctly?
